hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Bottom of the Well Compass#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.
